entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 60
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
